original_text:
The end is now upon you,
    and I will unleash my anger against you.
I will judge you according to your conduct
    and repay you for all your detestable practices.
korean_text: 이제는 네게 끝이 이르렀나니 내가 내 진노를 네게 나타내어 네 행위를 심판하고 네 모든 가증한 일을 보응하리라

sentences.original_text: The end is now upon you
and I will unleash my anger against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너에게 나의 분노를 쏟으리라

sentences.original_text: I will judge you according to your conduct
and repay you for all your detestable practices
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 모든 가증한 행위로 인해 너에게 갚으리라
